title: Drawing, "Studies of Ferns", early 20th century
medium: Brush and watercolor on blue-green paper
inscribed: recto: S. L. Crownfield (inscribed by her sister, Gertrude) / No. 32
creditline: Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney
description: Vertical sheet depicting six fronds of Boston or Christmas fern on the recto.  Fronds of the same fern are depicted on the verso.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Studies of Ferns", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Brush and watercolor on blue-green paper. Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney. 1937-59-13.
